text:
For a test plan performing JDBC samplers, the "Aggregate Report" shows the 
correct values (though "URL" might be misleading for the select statement) but 
not for the column "Error%". For all (valid and simple) SELECT statements, the 
result is "100%" - but should be "0.0%"´(right?).
creator: mhilpert@gmx.de

text:

configuration. unfortunately, there is a more detailed error message logging 
missing in JMeter.
